title: Surprise Allergies to 'Natural' Skin-Care Products
author: Anna Wilde Mathews
description: Dermatologists are seeing more allergic reactions to 'natural' personal-care products that contain lavender, jasmine and other botanical substances.
cleaned_text: April 18, 2016 1:11 pm ET Andrea Salinas for years used lavender-scented deodorant, figuring the "all-natural" product was healthier than commercial brands. She also used lavender oil as a body spray. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
